Package portfolios

Class AdvancedStockPortfolio

  • java.lang.Object
    • portfolios.SimpleStockPortfolio
      • portfolios.AdvancedStockPortfolio
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BetterStockPortfolio, StockPortfolio
    public class AdvancedStockPortfolio
extends SimpleStockPortfolio
implements BetterStockPortfolio
    The AdvancedStockPortfolio class extends the functionality of the original SimpleStockPortfolio implementation to include the new functions (i.e. plot, re-balance, etc...).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.List<BetterStock> stocks  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AdvancedStockPortfolio()
      Constructs a portfolios.AdvancedStockPortfolio object using a list of BetterStocks instead of Stocks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void adjustStock​(java.lang.String ticker, double shares)
      The adjustStock method adds or removes the specified number of shares of a given stock to the portfolio.
      void adjustStockOnDay​(java.lang.String ticker, double shares, java.time.LocalDate date)
      The adjustStockOnDay method adds or removes the specified number of shares of a given stock from the portfolio on a given date.
      private java.util.List<Stock> advancedToSimpleStockAdapter()
      Converts a list of AdvancedStocks to a list of SimpleStocks that have the corresponding number of shares and the correct ticker.
      private boolean containsStock​(java.lang.String ticker, java.util.List<BetterStock> stocks)
      The containsStock method searches a list of Stocks and return a boolean value indicating whether a stock of the given ticker was found in that list.
      java.lang.String distribution​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      The distribution method returns the distribution of stock in this portfolio as a string.
      private BetterStock find​(java.lang.String ticker)
      The find method searches this list of stocks and returns the Stock object that matches the given ticker.
      java.lang.String getCompositionOnDay​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      The getCompositionOnDay method returns a list of stock and the number of shares existent in a portfolio on a given day.
      java.util.List<Stock> getStocks()
      The getStocks method returns the list of Stocks currently in the portfolio.
      double getValue​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      The getValue method return the value of the entire portfolio on a given date based on the closing price of the stocks.
      private java.util.TreeMap<java.time.LocalDate,​java.lang.Double> getValuesInRange​(DateRange range)
      The getValuesInRange method returns a daily list of the values of a certain stock in the given range.
      java.lang.String listStocks()
      The listStocks method lists all the stocks in the current portfolio and the number of share of each.
      java.lang.String plot​(DateRange range)
      The plot method returns a visual representation of a portfolio's performance over a time range of WEEK, MONTH, YEAR, FIVE_YEARS, or TEN_YEARS.
      void rebalanceStock​(double expectedValue, java.time.LocalDate date, java.lang.String stockName)
      The rebalance Stock method rebalances a single stock.
      void savePortfolioToFile()
      The savePortfolioToFile method saves this portfolio to a CSV file that can be loaded into the program at a later date.
      private java.lang.String stockListToString​(java.util.List<BetterStock> stocks)
      The stockListToString method converts a list of Stock objects to a string list.

      • savePortfolioToFile

        public void savePortfolioToFile()
        Description copied from interface: BetterStockPortfolio
        The savePortfolioToFile method saves this portfolio to a CSV file that can be loaded into the program at a later date. The CSV file is named 'portfolio-name'.csv and is automatically saved to a new "portfolios" directory.
        Specified by:
        savePortfolioToFile in interface BetterStockPortfolio
